item.description:
Let's go to China Pearl for a dim sum brunch!

China Pearl - Phone # 617-426-4338
9 Tyler Street
Boston, MA

Please go to China Pearl's website for directions and dim sum menu:

http://www.chinapearl...

I'll send out my cell phone # to the brunch diners who reply yes. (Update: I have already given out my cell phone #, so if you don't have it, click on the envelope next to my name to get a hold of me.)

Please don't call me to give you directions because I'll accidently send you to the North End or the Back Bay! China Pearl's website has directions.

Please allow yourself enough time to get there by 12 noon because we can't wait for late comers.

No-shows are a no-no!!! Please be considerate and call me if you need to cancel at the last minute.

I'll hold a sign "Meet Up Brunch" and I'll have a bright golden-yellow LL Bean jacket.

Looking forward to this!

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum Brunch at China Pearl
